alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 21 at 8:59PM CST until January 22 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Lower St. Martin, East Cameron, St. Mary, West Cameron, Vermilion and Iberia Parishes. In Texas, Jefferson County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
